title: Gorgeous Downtown Denver Luxury Penthouse! Modern Design & Giant Patio
neighborhood: Lodo * Union Station * Downtown Denver * Ballpark * 5 Point
posting_body: Residence 1003 is a contemporary one-story Penthouse with two bedrooms and two-and-a-half bathrooms.
Luxurious ash hardwood floors fill this 1,806 square foot space and stunning views of the city with a backdrop of the rocky mountains are showcased apartment-wide.
The marble fireplace is a true show stopper and combines comfort and elegance for an enjoyable ambiance throughout the living and dining space.
Expansive storage spaces featuring custom California Closet systems can be found throughout the apartment.
The terrace boasts 232 sqft of private outdoor space allows for easy entertaining.
Large primary bedroom with ensuite and sizable soaking tub are sure to create an environment of relaxation.
